FRBRalias.value: The Election Laws (Extension To Sikkim) Act, 1976

p.shortTitle: The Election Laws (Extension To Sikkim) Act, 1976

formula.name: EnactingText
formula.p: BE it enacted by Parliament in the Twenty- sixth Year of the

longTitle.p: An Act to provide for the extension of the Representation of the
People Act, 1950 and the Representation of the People Act, 1951, to the State of Sikkim.

content.p: This Act may be called the
It shall be deemed to have come into force on the 9th day of
Extension and amendment of election laws.

section.heading: Extension and amendment of election laws.

content.p: The Acts mentioned in the Schedule are hereby extended to, and shall be in force in, the State of Sikkim.
With effect from the commencement of this Act, the Acts men-
tioned in the Schedule shall be amended as specified therein.
Any reference in the Acts mentioned in the Schedule to a law not in force, or to a functionary not in existence, in the State of
Sikkim shall be construed as a reference to the corresponding law in force, or to the corresponding functionary in existence, in that
Provided that if any question arises as to who such corresponding functionary is, or if there is no such corresponding functionary, the
Central Government shall decide as to who such functionary will be and the decision of the Central Government shall be final.
Sikkim) Ordinance, 1975, (9 of 1975) is hereby repealed.
Notwithstanding such repeal, anything done or any action taken under or by virtue of the said Ordinance shall be deemed to have been done or taken under or by virtue of this Act.
